text: The Wonderful Ice Cream Suit is a 1998 American fantasy comedy movie. It was directed by Stuart Gordon and written by Ray Bradbury. The movie stars Edward James Olmos, Joe Mantegna, Esai Morales, Clifton Collins Jr. (credited as Clifton Gonzalez Gonzalez), Sid Caesar, Howard Morris and Gregory Sierra. It is set in East Los Angeles. Category:1998 comedy movies Category:1990s fantasy-comedy movies
title: The Wonderful Ice Cream Suit
